      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause a song. The song can be resume until a new song is not requested.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop a song. Must use play for play a song.

      • resumeSong

        void resumeSong()
        Resume a song which was stopped.

      • getNumberOfFrame

        int getNumberOfFrame()
        Get the total number of frame of song. The song must be played to have a result.
        Returns:
        The total number of frame.

        Get the current frame which is payed.

        The frame played
